message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase a unique product.  I believe its value to you is substantial, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,350,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could consider coming down to $1,275,000. This is a very competitive offer considering its potential worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for the product.
